Event.name: Attempting_and_resolving_scenario
Event.definition: <def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> has a particular <fen>Goal</fen> in mind, and then uses some <fen>Means</fen> that they believe will bring about the <fen>Goal</fen>. The <fen>Agent</fen> succeeds or fails inasmuch as the result of the <fen>Means</fen> action matches the <fen>Goal</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Agent
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen> makes an attempt to achieve a <fen>Goal</fen>. <ex><fex name="Agent">John</fex> <t>attempted</t> to climb Mt. Everest.</ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Goal
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Goal</fen> is what the <fen>Agent</fen> attempts to achieve.
<ex>John <t>attempted</t> <fex name="Goal">to climb Mt. Everest GOAL</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Outcome
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Outcome</fen> is the failure or success of an attempt to achieve a <fen>Goal</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Means</fen> action performed by the <fen>Agent</fen> which they hope will bring about their <fen>Goal</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the attempt occurs.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The place where an attempt is made.
<ex><fex name="Place">On the bridge</fex> he <t>attempted</t> to put the wig on.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition: <def-root>The time period over which the attempts take place.</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>The manner in which the <fen>Agent</fen> attempts to achieve the <fen>Goal</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>The purpose for which the <fen>Agent</fen> attempts to achieve the <fen>Goal</fen>.</def-root>
